Blog.post: well, its just been another monday...notthing out of the ordinary really happend. Only for days left, thank god. Im starting to wonder how much more i can take, and how long i can keep the tiny bit sanity i have. Anyways, i can't wait for the weekend, im hoping the sun will come out, and stay out. ne ways, i g2g for now. Peace, -Maka

uh, im just settin dis shit up. i dun wonna these before to keep people up to date through the summer n' shit, so thats the plan. Anyways, when is summer gonna be here. I haven't seen the sun for weeks.....kinda makes u wanna stop singing and actually start sippin on gin & juice.....at school! Anyways, back to the grind tomrow, only five reg days left. Can't wait to get them exams dun, there gonna be rite killa. Oh well, like i keep sayin, thats life. ne ways, the rents are goin away for a lil bit this week..so i'll prolly get the boys up for a bit. Anyways, i gotta peel for now, take it easy yall. ~Maka

Well, the suns out an i wish i was on the beach rite now, hopefully this evenin i will be. Well i wrote my last exam friday, and im glad thats over. Then Brittani came over, that was fun. Saturday i went to SJ for a bit and went into the new house, and well today i have been cleaning and cleaning some more. But im all done thank god. Anyways, there isn't much kickin, im bout to start off another busy week, prom tomorow nite, work Tuesday, DJ wednsday, and work again Friday. Then i mite get a break for the weekend...or i might be starting my new job. Anyways, i g2g for now. Peace, -Maka

Well, I wrote my anglais today. I thought it was gonna be rite hardcore, but i was done in a 1hr and 23min. And man was I ever glad to get outta there. It's rite nice out, 33 C out front and its humid....just the way I like it, so i'll prolly go out and catch some rayz, and hit the beach! Anyways, I have two more exams left. So friday afternoon im free!....until the fall. Anyways, i g2g Peace, -Maka

Well i got 2 of my exams done, including my killa physics exam. Tomizzle i gots english. Wish me luck, its a beast. Anyways, i can't wait till friday, me and my babe brittani are hanging out, too bad its supposed to rain. Anyways ittle be summer for sure once these exams are done. ne ways, keep checkin back, peace! ~Maka

well now, its hump day....everyday this week seemed like friday though....i guess thats a good thing. Havin a lil "hang out" session tonite. Should be fun. But yea, to days of school left....yay! Anyways, i don't have much to say. Taker easy! Peace, - Maka

Howdy yall. Well im done my 5 days of vacation and its back to work tomorow at the museum and soon i will start DJin at the River View Pub. Also we got some big shows coming up for july. My girl Brittani has just gone away for work, so im kinda sad about it...but she just called me and made my day!...no week! anyways, its gonna be a crazy busy summer. take care and party safe everyone! Peace, -Maka
